name: Michelle
text: We live in South Texas but have family in the area and have passed this place while on vacation for years. Finally decided to try it and wasn't disappointed! The salad was fresh, the mushroom soup was amazing, we had both the Great White …More

name: Lucas Pierce
text: Went with some friends for drinks and pizza. The loaded baked potato pizza is amazing! The magic mushroom soup is one of the best soups I've ever had as well. Staff is friendly, and the atmosphere is laid back. Music and crowd wasn't too loud, so we were actually able to talk without feeling like we had to yell.

name: Lauren Anderson
text: In most restaurants, there is a "vegetarian option, " which is generous, but only one.... Or it's just salad or vegetables... We need protein too! I get tired of eating the same thing when I go out! I've been a vegetarian 30 years, and I …More

name: James McDonold
text: It was a Tuesday at 630pm, not many people.  Everyone socially distanced. Wait staff was awesome.  Good beer selection.  Beer was not as cold as we like but was good nonetheless.  Pizza was so good.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Robin Broome
text: Great service and tasty food.   Not a fan of the new paper straws but that's my only complaint.  This place is a favorite with my family.

name: Michael Shoulders
text: Holy Shitake Pizza was a big hit with our group and Mallory did an outstanding job taking care of us. Only slight disappointment was the California Club sandwich one in our party ordered. Much smaller than anticipated.

name: Mason Mallory
text: I was immediately greeted by probably the friendliest server I've ever met, even when the restaurant was packed. The atmosphere is groovy and likeable, just like the staff. …More

name: Bill Stephens
text: This is simply the best pizza I have ever had.  Uber thin, Crispy crust and fresh veggies.  Highly recommend!!!!!

name: Celeste J
text: I'm not a big pizza fan but stopped and ate at the Johnson City location and was pleasantly impressed. I had the stuffed portobello and the small pizza with ground beef and cheese on it. Every bite was top-notch delicious and I  will be back much sooner than later.

name: Sandy Chambers
text: Great food and atmosphere! However, I expected more social distancing protocols to be in place. Face masks should be required to enter dining room...at least until food is served.

name: WFI LLC
text: The best wings. Cookies and pizza very good.

name: Mary Hoilman
text: Our waitress was absolutely awesome ... And food was delicious to say it lightly.. Clean and very friendly and worth it to try it

name: Mohammad Darweesh
text: You can find a good pizza here! Cool restaurant with affordable prices.

name: Chris Mueller
text: It's made with only what you want. Like being the chef but without the work. Definitely try it out if you love real pizza.✌

name: Sabrina Hilton
text: Went tonight to the Johnson City location for my husband’s birthday was told the wait would be 30 minutes. After 45 minutes and watching other with the same amount in their party that came in after us be seated we asked how much longer. Was told the kitchen had cut off ppl being seated. Will not ever go back. Was treated very rudely.

name: Daniel Tunks
text: Wonderful!!!  The food was amazing and the waitress was even better...a definite would recommend!

name: Catherine Brudecki
text: First time here and found it to be a delightful experience. We had the mushroom soup appetizer and followed with the House Specialty pizza. Best crust ever! The flavor combination was wonderful. We enjoyed the atmosphere as well so we are sure to go here again soon.

name: River Stone
text: Seated immediately, took the waiter 20 minutes to get drinks then another 15 to take our order. 45 minutes when by and I actually fell asleep on the table waiting for a medium pizza and a calzone. First time visiting a Mellow Mushroom since …More

name: Melissa Bradley
text: The pizza was excellent.  My favorite was the Hawaiian pizza.  I believe it was called Pacific rim.  Not 100% sure on that name though.  Nice selection of craft beers.  The service wasn't the best, but they were packed out.  All of the …More

name: Brian Gibson
text: The food is great.  Very laid back place.  Top notch beer selection.

name: Michael Higgins
text: Hot fresh pizza! The Spinach dip was so good. Melted cheese, toasted points to dip and eat it with. The half subs were delicious. Kristopher was an amazing server. We definitely will be back.

name: Dawn Broyles
text: Great experience! Staff was extremely friendly and upbeat. The food was delicious! The Great White pizza was out of this world! And the brownie sundae will have you drooling!

name: Sean Cornett
text: Staff was great and fast to the table. Attentive to the fact we had other people coming later, fast with drinks and orders. Food was fresh made to order and everything tasted great. Will come back here any time for $1 slice Mondays.

name: R Rasnick
text: Ivreally love that they still have the Magical Mystery Tour!

name: The Darkness
text: A very fun and welcoming atmosphere. Loved the food and the bingo we got to play. Very much wish we had one in colorado

name: James Johnson
text: Great staff, very good food.

name: Margie Berry
text:
1st time visiting any Mellow Mushroom. It was Great! We really enjoyed the whole experience
Gonna try other locations too

name: Brett G
text: I love coming here for pizza. I've tried many of their pizzas and have not been disappointed yet. A little pricey but the quality is VERY good.

name: Rose Cormier
text: The service has always been great and I've never had any food from here that wasn't spot on!

name: Earl Leonard
text: Great pizza! Good friendly service!

name: Jeremiah .honeycutt
text: Love this restaurant, I eat here 2-3 times a week, the staff/bartenders are awesome for the most part! The pizza is really good, they have pizza by the slice until 3 pm . But the salads and subs are to die for! I love being able to build my …More

name: Janna Hubbard
text: Fun atmosphere with delicious food!

name: Lori Schwartz
text: Food was good, large portions, fresh. Staff was courteous, prompt, knowledgeable. Clean bathrooms and lots of unusual decor throughout.

name: Susan Axelrod
text: Can't believe I never ate here before last night! Pizza was outstanding! Definitely will be back. Server was super sweet too!

name: Matthew McCrory
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. My favorite pizza is there, atmosphere is chill and laid back. The staff is friendly and prompt. I highly recommend it :)

name: Adam Slade
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Tricia Salts
text: Pizza was really good and we also had pretzel bites with cheese that were really goo too

name: Sean Paul
text: Went here for my birthday on the 16th of February. Great pizza, great service, great atmosphere. Just a bit on the pricey side.

name: Karen Crozier
text: The food was good. The server/waitress was lousy.

name: Misti Hillebrand
text: Sunday is my favorite day to eat here. Half-price wings and they are amazing! Friendly service!

name: Brian
text: Great server.  Great beer.  Pizza is going down hill.   I would've prefered Little Cesara tonight by far.

name: Todd Bailey
text: Very good food

name: Cara Williams
text: Had friendly service

name: Sheila Bledsoe
text: Pleasant atmosphere and best pizza all around!!!

name: Shannon Stike
text: Great service,  friendly staff

name: Jane W
text: My husband's favorite restaurant. Changing eclectic decor, both family and intimate seating, music is surprising and fun.

name: Brianna Riffe
text: Service is so slow. I came in and was sat immediately then waited 10 minutes for a waitress. I have a full hour on my lunch break and still had to get it to go even though I intended on dining in. Food is great but dont come famished or expecting timely service.

name: Bob T
text: Had the overpriced medium mega meat pizza. The service was OK but the bacon on the pizza was raw and I had to pick it off. Other than that the pizza was good. The waiter refilled my unsweetened iced tea with sweet tea which wasn't much more than sugar water. This was the second bad experience I've had there and I will not be going back.

name: Sam Laughs
text: The bomb would be nice if they had FROZEN margaritas but still bomb!

name: Whitney Atkinson
text: We just moved back two weeks ago and have had Mellow Mushroom from this location twice.  I had never eaten at this location before then, but Mellow never disappoints. They had a new Reuben pizza I wanted to try, but I was too chicken ish. …More

name: Joey Collins
text: Kelly=Winning! He is best dang bartender on planet earth! I know what winning service feels like. Dale Yeah!

name: Jonathan Broome
text: Great food and service. Pizza is always fantastic and made to order even with some very picky family members. They are more than willing to make just about anything in any combination you can think of. One of my old hangups with the place …More

name: Dorothy Meredith
text: Umm no. I am not paying 87.06 in door dash delivery charges.

name: Elaine Holmes
text: The salad with cranberries, feta cheese, spinach, and apples was great. The mushroom soup was less of a broth and more like a gravy. The mushrooms were tasty.

name: Todd and Frankie Vieu
text: Actually it should be a 3.5 food was good as always, our bartender was sweet. We were there 10 minutes before free half price apps, we ordered believing the apps wouldn't be made until 2, since we wanted to enjoy our drinks, so no half …More

name: joshvega05
text: Good pizza, good service, a decent selection of beer. Not too noisy, a good place to take the family.

name: Latasha Jordan
text: Today was my first time here with my husband. We both got hoagies and roasted potatoes. I loved the decor and the food is a little pricey but it is totally worth it!

name: Charlie Puckett
text: Great service, delicious wings. Hot and tasty.

name: Suzanne P
text: We really enjoyed the spinach salad and appreciated that we could order slices. Not overeating is always a bonus! We look for Mellow Mushroom whenever we are in TN or NC.

name: Richard Wampler
text: A little pricey, but great food and an interesting atmosphere!

name: Ramona Bienfang
text: Excellent mushroom Soupsame for the hamburger

name: Kyle Merdian
text: Good food but the price is a little high for what you get.

name: Kevin Green
text: Lovely place with equally waitresses

name: Lizi Landers
text: This place is groovy! Love the atmosphere and the people. Loved working here when I did back in '14-'15, it was a fun job for sure. Stay mellow and don't change a thing!

name: Chris Loop
text: Really nice place with nice customers. Pizza is to die for hot or cold if your warming up leftovers

name: jessi Webb
text: Love the bar staff! The gin and cucumber cocktail was delicious and the pretzel bites and beer cheese were heavenly.

name: Kristin Minton
text: Mushroom soup excellent. Hoagie sandwich top notch

name: Clay Sanders
text: This place is A++ Great customer service, and even better food. Also, if you plan on getting a drink here, they give you your money's worth. One of my favorites for sure.

name: Fred Mikula
text: First time eating here was a fun place to eat! Food a bit pricey but taste was good!

name: Steve Jones
text: Good food and friendly staff was really busy but got in and wAs taken care of

name: Crystine Goebel
text: Very good pizza!

name: Tonya
text: Fantastic food and service

name: TopGun Moving Service
text: TopGun Moving Loves this place Great Pizza and Service!

name: Ken Siksay
text: Pleasant and relaxed atmosphere. I had a delicious meatball sub and my daughter and i shared a specialty pizza which was also great! Cool place!

name: Stephanie Lauderdale
text: Love the pizzas and trivia on Thursdays is a blast! The servers are fantastic and very prompt

name: Robert Morris
text: Good food high price. Lucky if you see your server twice too busy running other people s food. 9yr old won at bingo best part! her reward was tequila shirt unfortunately and couldn't exchange we were told too bad by several employee s but …More

name: Andrew putman
text: Food was excellent and the waitress took great care of us while tending bar also. We never ran out of drink and the food was hot.

name: pizzadog50
text: pretty darn good. cool server

name: Chad Prisk
text: I haven't had good luck with mellow mushroom at other locations and I didnt want to eat at this one, but the wife did so I relented.  Thankfully, this one was on point,  service was good and food was excellent.

name: Sheila Reed
text: I’ve been a regular at mellow mushroom a couple of years now. Anastasia and Jon are both amazing bartenders! I love sitting with them either on Sundays or for trivia. All the staff is friendly really. I’ve never had an issue with food but I …More

name: kelly newman
text: Great bar and pizza!   Staff is great!! Especially Reagan who makes the best pizza!

name: CECIL PERRY
text:
Ok pizza in a pinch.
Good service.

name: Danny Keplinger
text: Fun and a great pie. Beer selection is great.

name: Darlene Denis
text:
The best food!
The best staff!
Highly recommend!

name: Leigh
text: Enjoyed the atmosphere good food clean great customer service will be back

name: Kimberly Wright
text: Great food! All natural ingredients

name: Katherine Smith
text: The pizza is so-so, and the prices are outrageous.  I spent $75 on 3 pizzas and each one was dry, and the toppings were barely there.  For that price, It better be the best dang pizza ever.  I feel like you pay for the mellow mushroom name, …More

name: LatinGirl PR
text: The best pizza I've had in years and a very friendly environment

name: Claire Harlock Garber
text: Had many wonderful experiences dining in. Great veggie and omnivore options. We ordered pies and appetizers for our family reunion and loved it!

name: Craig Black
text: It's fine. Not super great but just fine.

name: John Hames
text: Excellent service,  cheese pizza was excellent

name: cory Windham
text: Pizza is always solid however just a little pricey.  Atmosphere is amazing servers are hit or miss have had great and not so great overall if you order to go and have the money awesome pizza.  If you go in try and use a coupon because it's just a little on the pricier side

name: Jill Channing
text: Very good! Excellent crust. I recommend a meatball pizza.

name: Rick Kind
text: Mellow is always a good choice for food, drinks or both. It is evident the place is well managed since the food and service are always on point.

name: Eric Wheeler
text: Good food fun staff cool place to go with friends

name: Curt Johnson
text: Great service, fun atmosphere and the pizza was to come for. To be a able to create any kind of pizza my imagination could think of and they make it for me! Yes!!!!!

name: shirley souther
text: Love  this pizza. It's so good.

name: Lone Wolf
text: It was good but not good enough to keep going there. It is quite expensive for a pizza place.

name: Tim Labay
text: Cold beer and great pizza, who could ask for more. Maybe you will be lucky enough to have the amazing Anastasia behind the bar!

name: Michael XeroX Purdum
text: Nice.

name: Jessica Keller
text: We really like the bingo night and the mushroom soup is excellent.

name: Sofia Haught
text: Yum times infinity! such great food and atmosphere! awesome bottle light, awesome pizza, and awesome everything!

name: Tina Durham
text: Waitress was good, food sucked! I got a hamburger and a filly steak and both was nasty! Paid 40$ for both and tip and wish I had ate somewhere else!

name: Kyle Wirick
text: Great pizza and salad. Took the family for lunch, two with gluten allergies. They pay good attention to limiting cross contamination and can accommodate gluten, dairy and other allergies. Recommend the Greek salad with Esperanza dressing. And frozen Jack and Coke? Yes please.

name: A
text:
This place is very drab. We go frequently for $1 pizza but honestly compared to other Mellow
Mushrooms, it’s just boring.

name: Jack Ellis
text: Super helpful staff and great food

name: James Hill
text: Great food. Good service. Pricey for pizza.

name: Wayne S
text: Great pizza, go here most Mondays for their $1 slice and $1.25 Rolling Rock Beer. Amazing pizza on a budget.

name: Theodore Blumberg
text: We got a grilled chicken on top of a well-made salad very fresh. We asked for 4 blue cheese salad dressings, but got 8 - four each salad. We laughed. Our server was fine and very enjoyable and checked in often to make sure our drinks were …More

name: Arlyn Purvis
text: We went for lunch and all got lunch specials. We were totally surprised by how big the portions were. Pleased with our visit.

name: Raquel Galford
text: Love it. Gluten free options. Homemade crust. Organic ingredients😋 yum

name: Mike Frizzell
text: Delicious, varied selection of artisan fresh-dough pizza. A little pricey but worth it. Many interesting salads and accompaniments. Dozens of possible toppings offered. Friendly and attentive wait staff. Their House selection and Great White pizzas were both mouth-watering.

name: Janith Smith
text: I have to give a great compliment here, especially on our wait staff assistant. We visited here when my daughter and son-in-law came in for a visit. They wanted to eat outside and our waiter promptly assisted us and got our drinks. …More

name: Pam Gilliam
text: It was fun as we went on bingo night. The salad and spinach dip was good. Have had better pizza but did order thin crust which was my mistake. Next time I will get thick crust. Ok went back and this time ordered the thick crust and it was good.

name: Rey Rey
text: The pizza was awesome. So awesome I forgot to take a picture before we dug in. Oh and since was great.

name: cotume27
text: Excellent food and great staff!

name: Pamela Goans
text: Service was very good. We had a large party and they did a great job. Food was good.

name: Kathy VanLew
text: Pizzas were amazing atmosphere entertaining

name: Natalie Sheffey
text: Mondays are $1 slice and $1.30 Rolling Rocks! Love the vibes here so much. Everyone is so chill.

name: Aprile Carter
text: Great food atmosphere and service love it

name: Paige Williams
text: Always crowded, but fast service. Great location.

name: Raymond Powers
text: Great pizza and service.. relaxing atmosphere and I love the food

name: Bones Swigert
text: The help is awful...10 employees running around .. only one customer at tables yet it took over 20 minutes to make 2 spinach salads...pizza is bubbled..and at best mediocre

name: Michael Sedlar
text: Very good pizza, friendly staff, and reasonable prices!

name: Gerald Franklin
text: Had a waiter with a man bun. He needs to learn some maners. When some one say thank you do not reply back "no problem". The correct response is your welcome. Also order a burger and they come back and told me they were out of meat. I guess who ever dose the ordeing sucks at that too.

name: Richard McLemore
text: I'm partial to the knowing of perfect speaks perfectly fine for itself.

name: Wendy White
text: We all love good mellow pizza, and I really crave the vegan cheese from here. But this location often gets my order wrong. They’re always so kind and fix it right away, but it’s an important distinction to make for someone’s dietary restrictions.

name: Caleb Pace
text: Great pizza. Lots of topping choices. Great specials as well

name: David Michel
text: Welcoming and inviting

name: Andrea Paul
text: Great pizza and very filling!

name: K Yearout
text: I always like Mellow Mushroom. Their pizza is amazing and the staff is really friendly. Check it out!

name: Corey Alukonis
text: Delicious pizza as always and really quick service.  First time I was there for lunch and their special was perfect for my wife and I.

name: Lauren Elizabeth
text: Great service and amazing pizza.

name: Jonathan Harrington
text: Excellent pizza and service.

name: Jeffrey pitt
text: Great food, great service. Always happy to return.

name: Sharon Collins
text: We had a pepperoni  pizza today for lunch and it was really good. This was our first visit and we will go back again.  Our waitress was very nice  and the place looked clean.

name: kristy kettenbauer
text: Great selection of beer and food. The best mushroom soup in the county. Great atmosphere, awesome staff.

name: Rob Montgomery
text: They have to be one the best pizzerias in Johnson City.  Lots of choices, affordable, great deals, and the food speaks for itself.  Great atmosphere and friendly & knowledgable staff.  Have not had one bad experience in dining there.  My …More

name: Andrew Edds
text: I love the beer selection here and the bar is great.  The pizza is some of the best I've ever had, which I attribute largely to the amazing crust and flavorful toppings.  When the weather is nice, the patio is a great place to be. The food isn't cheap, but it's worth it.

name: Tim Eubanks
text: Mostly great food but some quality inconsistencies in repeat ordering. Always great interaction with the trendy, cool staff but sometimes slow service if you have limited time. Specifically, lunch service has been slow on several occasions. My overall satisfaction is high. Great atmosphere. Great beer selection.

name: James Jones
text: The food was delicious! We got a half sandwich with chips and it was plenty. I only wanted more because it was so good. There are tons of options for pizza and they weren't too expensive, but definitely better to get a bigger pizza for the whole table instead of individual ones.

name: Manni Cervantes
text: Great place to eat and take the family. Fresh food good customer service

name: Kimberly Marshall
text: Monday dollar slices is a great deal and their pizza is amazing!!

name: Jen Stainer
text: Good pizza. Fun decor but the music is too loud.

name: Darlene Denis
text:
Really 💜 Mellow Mushroom! They have Vermont Woodchuck Hard Cider, the freshest ingredients and an amazing menu, and hands down the best staff!
The burger and pan-fried potatoes were delicious and so filling! …More

name: Marcie Rasnick
text: Great  pizzas great wings,  they charge for ranch which in today's time is odd.  They are a good portion.

name: Pattie Brown
text: Megan our server was on it! The pizza was excellent as usual. Decor very amusing. Always a great meal and atmosphere at Mellow Mushroom!

name: J
text: Great pizza place in Johnson City, Tn.  I often enjoy the happy hour specials. An appetizer, slice of cheese pie, and a cold beer is a nice treat. Hip atmosphere with a cool staff.

name: Hannah Freeman
text: Great wings. Tai chili wings are our favorite. Pizza is good but pepperronis have odd flavor. Crust is Great! It's thinner but good chew. Get the marinara to dip your crust in. So much flavor in the marinara.

name: Landry Rimer
text: Always a kind and courteous staff. And the food is always perfect ! We love this place!

name: Crystal Griffin
text: We have been going to the mellow mushroom since first opened.  We went last night there menu has change the serving sizes are significantly smaller than they used to be.  I order the same thing I always get they don't have the same bread …More

name: Lavonna Skeans
text: I think they have good service. The last 2 times I have eaten there, I have had really bad stomach issues. I think the artchokes were bad.

name: Matt Palmatier
text: Great pizza, good beer selection, service is hit-and-miss. One time, my wife and I sat for 30 min at our table before our server showed up, other times we've had great service. It ends up being right around 30% of the time there service totally sucks. I only go back bc of the proximity and beer selection.

name: Bret Coleman
text: Overpriced. Good lunch deals tho. I just can’t fathom buying a specialty pizza for $25. Beer prices are through the roof too. Definitely not for me.

name: Julie Braden
text: A little pricey but good stuff.

name: Greg Peters
text: Great pizza, I always stop here when I'm in town.

name: Jonathan Poarch
text: Best place to go and hangout and enjoy the best selection of beer across the world and the best pizza in the world. Great service and always a great place to eat and relax.

name: Travis Housewright
text: Tasty pizza made with quality ingredients!   This is a notch above the typical pizza guys...and well worth it.  Good craft beer selection too.

name: James Greer
text: Pizza was great but I got charged too much for my drink LOL

name: David Bourke
text: Great food & Friendly staff. Love the "hippie-ness"!!

name: Mystee Wooten
text: Kids really liked it there. Fun games they played with everybody there. And really good food.

name: Dj Brooks
text: Great meal and Emily (our server) was awesome! She works on Sat/Sun & we will def ask for her again! Naked wings and bruschetta were the feature of our meal and we highly recommend both!

name: Isaiah Williams
text: Food was like always extremely good I was just not expecting to walk in to a bingo game vs Asheville mellow mushroom has an incredible vibe

name: Brian Watson
text: Great Food and awesome service.  Wonderful atmosphere. We will be back

name: Poe Mcfoe
text: The service was spectacular!

name: Sommer Salyers
text: Amazing atmosphere, amazing food, and amazing staff. My favorite party of this place is to watch the kitchen spin and flip the pizza dough! I would rate most than five stars if I could. Just such a wonderful place!

name: Debra Carlone
text: Awesome waitress ... Delicious thin crust pizza !!

name: N & N Photography
text: Had a great time with coworkers and friends here. Staff are friendly and we're quick with our orders and food.

name: Chuck Irwin
text: Great place, had a wonderful time.

name: Matthew Moore
text: The foods is good but a little dry and gave me bad tea. The overall since they were in hurried cause if holiday. They did a good job.

name: michael johnson
text: Loved it

name: angelique Williams
text: Went there on Christmas Eve they not only gave us the drinks and everything we wanted but gave us some pizzas to go and they were very good. The bartender , she was so wonderful and so sweet! Fun atmosphere.

name: LiSa FrAnK
text: Interesting vibe & the Holy Shiitake pizza, so delicious!

name: Michael Mosser
text: The manager asked if he needed to turn music down for our special needs son. I was blown away he also said anything we can do just let us know. There are no words . You have a lifetime customer.!!!

name: Rick Manning
text: The pizza is of an excellent quality

name: Renee Roell
text: Great NY style pizza in Tennessee

name: Larry Cash
text: Friendly staff, good food (pizza) is what we had, very clean ,and affordable

name: Nathaniel Galloway
text: 40$ for a large three topping pizza this is highway robbery didn’t even taste good and the avocado that I paid 6$ for was not even ready to be consumed it was hard as hell. This is basic ass pizza for outlandish prices. The dough sucks I could have been just as happy at little Caesars

name: Joel LeLeu
text: Service and food were excelle t. Love the vibe of the place..

name: Joseph Buchanan
text: Overpriced. Service not the best. Shoulda got dominoes😖

name: Scott Whitman
text: Great patio. Great pizza. Cheap beer!

name: Brian Rowland
text: Pizza was awesome. Sauce is good.

name: Sandra Smith
text: Don't use a debit card its a second window for the server to put in her own tip. Even after i left her cash on the table. That's bad business 👎

name: Larry A
text: Pizza is always good!

name: Jason Richardson
text: Good gluten free pizza. Mighty meaty is great. Salads are pretty good too. Service was nice.

name: Shannon Eaton
text: It was ok tonight. I have ate there and it was a lot better.

name: Suzane & Justin Cary
text: Food was delicious, I just wish they would clean their menus. Everytime I come in, they are sticky and filthy.

name: Cheryl Merriken
text: Friendly staff.  Very efficient.

name: Mandy Osborne
text: I love thier atmosphere, pizza and spinach artichoke dip!!

name: Betty Lawson
text: Always great pizza and atmosphere

name: Randy Smythe
text: It's way too noisy!

name: Bud Garant
text: On behalf of our entire family we would like to thank Mellow Mushroom for the excellent customer service and hospitality they graciously provided on the occasion of our daughter's graduation celebration yesterday (12/15/18).  I would …More

name: michael sliter
text: Great food,just a little too high price

name: david blair
text: This location used to be hip and exciting. Now we have to come earlier so we can listen to music- which tonight was sad songs and country-ughhhh!! The bingo starts at 6 and then all atmosphere of having a relaxed night goes away. Sorry guys but Karoke was so much better!!!!

name: Nikki Tester
text: 1$ cheese slice modays

name: Corey Garland
text:
Mike, the "manager" may have a slightly big head, and thinks his job is a little more important than it actually is.
He created a problem, that wasnt a problem, until he felt the need to show that …More

name: bobby dykes
text: The service here is wonderful the food is awesome and the staff super friendly I would recommend this place to anybody also it's awesome place to hang out and get to know people

name: Barbara Cole
text: Great pizza.....wings half price on Sunday

name: jim lauderdale
text: Trivia night on Thursday is as always a blast. Fantastic waitstaff and good food

name: Norris Mckinney
text: Awesome awesome pizza with superb service

name: Atticus Finch
text: Good pizza, but pricey and they don't tell you what or where they source their ingredients, "proprietary information"🤔

name: Gloria Fernandez
text: Food good ,excellent but waitress service  no no ,

name: Claire Lyness
text: Visiting Johnson City & heard this place was the BEST pizza around...they sure were right ! Thanks

name: Nate Lescarbeau
text: Absolutly love this place. Sundays are the best time.

name: Brooke Jarrard
text: Great food and love the hippie decor.

name: Susan Seidler
text: Mmm...great pizza, dozens of toppings to choose from. I believe Mondays in Johnson City are dollar slice night. Full bar is an extra bonus.

name: Sri Naidnur
text: Vegan pizza is so expensive. Taste is debatable.

name: Stanley Reedy
text: Really good food and great staff and management !!!

name: Van Mominee
text: The pizza is excellent. Mighty meaty is the bomb. The beer flows cold and often. Staff is friendly. My only con is the foods pricey, despite this I'm here every week.

name: M Vaughn
text: Good food. Good service!

name: michelle gent
text: Great food and staff

name: Tammy McManus
text: Pizza is so great and I love it....

name: Katherine Miller
text: Great pizza, excellent craft beer selection. Acoustics are terrible, but everything else about it is great!

name: David King
text: Very good food. Will definitely be going back.

name: Jerry Butler
text: The food was amazing.  The pizza and greek salad took me back in time when everything was homemade.  Prices were reasonable and service was excellent

name: Kimberly Collins
text: Gluten-free, vegan cheese pizza is awesome! Always great service

name: Zoe Salvatore
text:
The food was A+, our server was Rachel and she was fantastic...

She wasn't overbearing and she always came over at the right time. She was super sweet and informative about the food.

name: Jake Wells
text: Julie is the best server there! Exceptional service! God bless her.

name: david soto
text: If you like good food good music and even better vibes this is the place for you. Love the hippie feel, you can definitely tell the employees enjoy their jobs. It seems as if they don't have a judgmental hiring process people of all colors ages and races are welcome.

name: Kathryn Greer
text: Very fast service good food

name: Peter Garst
text: Ok... Pizza was good, but the PRICE! Go to earth fare and get a pizza that's huge for 6 DOLLARS! Tastes the same! Also, our waitress was TERRIBLE! We ordered two pizzas, and both turned out wrong. Basically a "hipster hangout" you pay for the interesting building.

name: L B
text: Good pizza and nice beer selection. The patio always seems under staffed, with long waits for service, however server was pleasant. Overly priced for the type and quality of food.

name: Queen Lee
text: Love Mellow mushroom!!!  My first time at this location. I was passed by about 3 servers who didn't stop to ask if I needed help but then was helped by a "Jenae" (I could be misspelling her name)  who was VERY helpful. I ordered to go and sat at the bar, the bar staff was VERY helpful, as well.

name: Jessica Milhorn
text:
Great service, as always! The Potato Pizza is new (to me anyway) and it was nothing shy of amazing!!
5 stars all the way around!!!!

name: Laura Samples, Real Estate Professional
text: Good food, nice environment, efficient staff. Prices a bit too high but not ridiculous.

name: Lea Relyea
text: Great pizza! The first time they made a mistake on the pizza but they were happy to fix it for us.

name: Susan Delgado
text: Pizza with a twist. The pie with potatoes and the cesar pie are awesome. Our server was wonderful.

name: Leslie Sparks
text: Fun place to meet your friends & have good pizza

name: EstherSylvia Firlej-Perisin
text: Fast service with a smile.  Good selection of various pizza styles.  Somewhat limited beverage selection. But over all if you are looking for a pizza r'n Johnson City I can highly recommend the Mellow Mushroom.

name: Carla Stroud
text: Great service! Great food! Great Atmosphere!

name: Scott Simmons
text: Pizza was good service was lacking

name: Cole Morgan
text: Pizza had almost no sauce, should have asked for some on the side but I didn't think of it. Might try another pizza place before going back

name: Eugene Lockhart
text: Ask for the vegetarian portobello mushroom hoagie (it's not on the menu anymore)

name: Alex Lauderdale
text: Nice atmosphere. The mushroom soup was okay, pizza was not worth the price; comparable quality can be had at the university cafeteria at a much lower price point. There were too many toppings for the pizza to cook correctly and it just tasted mediocre.

name: Andie Carpenter
text: Good food and service

name: Jeff Anderson

name: Chelsea James
text: Great calzones! Large portions, so sharing IS an option!

name: Adam Hall
text: Seriously. This is the best pizza you'll ever eat. Love the vegan pies. When I ate meat, the Maui Wowie was super delicious.

name: Allison Owens
text: Their pizza is delicious! Reminds me of place I grew up with back home.

name: Christina Johnson
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of the best places to eat. The atmosphere is fun and the food is amazing.

name: Jeremy Rasnic
text: If a place is known for their pizza, get the pizza. I got the burger and it looked and tasted more like a frozen patty than something made on site. On the server side of things, mine was phenomenal! She should be training others if she's not already!

text: Great pizza and salad!

text: Food was ok.  We reserved a large table for a team hours in advance.   They gave us 1 waitress.  Ordered a beer, never got it.  45 minutes later waitress asked if i still wanted that beer.  It was a Thursday night, not a weekend night.  Haven't been there in years and  tonight I remembered why.

name: Laurel Lovelace
text: Pricey but good.

name: Kendra Clevenger
text: Beer is way too pricey, even their cheap beer is too much. Manager is pretentious.  Pizza is good. Gimmicky.

name: Travis Deeth
text: Great pizza, tons of draught beer choices, friendly staff.   A bit on the expensive side so I docked one star.

name: Bram Thornton
text: I ordered the Chicken Cesare wrap, because I thought it would be more than some salad in a flour tortilla. It wasn't though. The salad was sub par and the tortilla was old tough to eat. Why is it on the menu? Why are things that aren't …More

name: Randy Fair
text: Good pizza. Wayyy too expensive. Large pizza & one soft drink $32!

text: There's usually a long wait to get your order but it's very fresh and absolutely delicious. This is a great place to get together with friends and family.

text:
Great atmosphere. Wonderful staff especially the manager Michelle Radford
